mapper.insert: insert into BranchHistory(branchHistory_seq ,stock_code1, stock_code2,name1,name2, start_date, end_date, id,report,resultCount) values(branchHistory_seq.nextval,#{stock_code1},#{stock_code2},#{name1},#{name2},#{start_date},#{end_date},#{id},#{report},#{resultCount})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT name1,name2,stock_code1, stock_code2, resultcount FROM BranchHistory WHERE id = '1' AND stock_code1 IS NOT NULL AND stock_code2 IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM BranchHistory WHERE id = #{id} AND stock_code1 IS NOT NULL AND stock_code2 IS NOT NULL AND stock_code3 IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM BranchHistory WHERE id = #{id} and stock_code1 IS NOT NULL AND stock_code2 IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM BranchHistory WHERE id = #{id} and report AND stock_code1 IS NOT NULL AND stock_code2 IS NOT NULL AND stock_code3 IS NOT NULL
SELECT ad.name FROM ( SELECT ad.name, ROWNUM AS rn FROM BranchHistory su JOIN AvailableData ad ON su.stock_code1 = ad.stock_code WHERE su.stock_code1 = #{stock_code1} ) ad WHERE rn = 1
SELECT ad.name FROM ( SELECT ad.name, ROWNUM AS rn FROM BranchHistory su JOIN AvailableData ad ON su.stock_code2 = ad.stock_code WHERE su.stock_code2 = #{stock_code2} ) ad WHERE rn = 1
SELECT ad.name FROM ( SELECT ad.name, ROWNUM AS rn FROM BranchHistory su JOIN AvailableData ad ON su.stock_code3 = ad.stock_code WHERE su.stock_code3 = #{stock_code} ) ad WHERE rn = 1
